text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/9b7bf9e98f06ece595fed7a3ff53ecce89797a53|patch 8.2.1183: assert_fails() checks the last error message>
patch 8.2.1183: assert_fails() checks the last error message

Problem:    assert_fails() checks the last error message.
Solution:   Check the first error, it is more relevant.  Fix all the tests
            that rely on the old behavior.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1183: assert_fails() checks the last error message · vim/vim@9b7bf9e
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1183: assert_fails() checks the last error message · vim/vim@9b7bf9e
attachments.text: Problem: assert_fails() checks the last error message. Solution: Check the first error, it is more relevant. Fix all the tests that rely on the old behavior.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/13c046316b2e651871701ed81e2ba4763b19b67d|patch 8.2.1186: with SGR mouse codes balloon doesn't show up after click>
patch 8.2.1186: with SGR mouse codes balloon doesn't show up after click

Problem:    With SGR mouse codes balloon doesn't show up after click.
Solution:   Add the MOUSE_RELEASE bits to mouse_code.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1186: with SGR mouse codes balloon doesn't show up after click · vim/vim@13c0463
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1186: with SGR mouse codes balloon doesn't show up after click · vim/vim@13c0463
attachments.text: Problem: With SGR mouse codes balloon doesn't show up after click. Solution: Add the MOUSE_RELEASE bits to mouse_code.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/c85156bb897085d7f5a8e4e180287f87bf19b948|patch 8.2.1187: terminal2 test sometimes hangs in the GUI on Travis>
patch 8.2.1187: terminal2 test sometimes hangs in the GUI on Travis

Problem:    Terminal2 test sometimes hangs in the GUI on Travis.
Solution:   Disable Test_zz2_terminal_guioptions_bang() for now.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1187: terminal2 test sometimes hangs in the GUI on Travis · vim/vim@c85156b
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1187: terminal2 test sometimes hangs in the GUI on Travis · vim/vim@c85156b
attachments.text: Problem: Terminal2 test sometimes hangs in the GUI on Travis. Solution: Disable Test_zz2_terminal_guioptions_bang() for now.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/6d3a7213f58da834b0fc869d05f87e86010c66cf|patch 8.2.1188: memory leak with invalid json input>
patch 8.2.1188: memory leak with invalid json input

Problem:    Memory leak with invalid json input.
Solution:   Free all keys at the end. (Dominique Pellé, closes #6443,
            closes #6442)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1188: memory leak with invalid json input · vim/vim@6d3a721
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1188: memory leak with invalid json input · vim/vim@6d3a721
attachments.text: Problem: Memory leak with invalid json input. Solution: Free all keys at the end. (Dominique Pellé, closes #6443, closes #6442)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/8af81d656a4c501611f6211b6379ea9dd650c545|patch 8.2.1189: Vim9: line continuation in lambda doesn't always work>
patch 8.2.1189: Vim9: line continuation in lambda doesn't always work

Problem:    Vim9: line continuation in lambda doesn't always work.
Solution:   Do not use a local evalarg unless there isn't one. (closes #6439)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1189: Vim9: line continuation in lambda doesn't always work · vim/vim@8af81d6
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1189: Vim9: line continuation in lambda doesn't always work · vim/vim@8af81d6
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: line continuation in lambda doesn't always work. Solution: Do not use a local evalarg unless there isn't one. (closes #6439)
